about_the_game:
Game Description:

Become the hero of a fantasy world and defend against monster invasions! Legacy of Defense - Prologue is an innovative defense game that combines side-scrolling action and deck-building elements. In the prologue, you can play the introductory version of Legacy of Defense and earn prologue-exclusive achievements.

Key Features:

Side-Scrolling Action: Experience intense battles with stunning 2D graphics and intuitive controls. Feel the thrill of defending against waves of incoming monsters.

Deck-Building Strategy: Collect various cards to build your own deck. Each card contains powerful skills that require strategic play.

Fantasy Monsters: Face a variety of fantasy monsters that you can only imagine. Each monster has unique abilities that you must counter.


Skill Upgrades: Gain experience through battles and upgrade your hero’s skills. Use powerful skills to more effectively sweep away the monsters.

Gameplay:

Defend against waves of incoming monsters. Choose cards to use skills and defeat your enemies. Strategic deck-building is the key to victory. Clear each stage and face increasingly powerful monsters to defeat the final boss!

Legacy of Defense - Prologue: Test your strategy and skills. Are you ready to become the brave hero and save the fantasy world?
